meanings.sent1: Her entry into the room was graceful.
meanings.sent2: Please make your entry through the main door.
meanings.sent3: His entry onto the dance floor was like a swan gliding on water.
meanings.sent4: The entry of sunlight through the window brightened up the whole room.
meanings.sent5: The entry of the new student brought a wave of excitement to the class.

meanings.definition: A passage or doorway for entering
meanings.sent1: The narrow entry to the cave made it feel mysterious.
meanings.sent2: The grand entry of the palace was adorned with intricate carvings.
meanings.sent3: The cat's entry through the pet door startled the dog.
meanings.sent4: The entry to success is often through hard work and dedication.
meanings.sent5: The entry to the secret garden was hidden behind a wall of ivy.

meanings.definition: A record or item in a list or database
meanings.sent1: His entry in the attendance sheet was marked with a red pen.
meanings.sent2: The entry for the competition must be submitted before the deadline.
meanings.sent3: The entry of the wrong data caused confusion in the report.
meanings.sent4: Her entry in the guestbook was filled with compliments and well wishes.
meanings.sent5: The entry of the new product in the catalog boosted sales.

meanings.definition: A person or team participating in a competition
meanings.sent1: The team's entry in the tournament surprised everyone with their skill.
meanings.sent2: His entry in the race was met with cheers from the crowd.
meanings.sent3: The cat's entry in the pet show won the hearts of the judges.
meanings.sent4: Her entry in the baking contest impressed the judges with her creativity.
meanings.sent5: The entry of the underdog team in the championship game led to an unexpected victory.
